%c[0,150,150,150]In Soulslike mode, death technically never happens.
 
Upon "death" your are rescued by a random Stalker in the zone.

 They bring you back to the set last spawn location where you awake to find a message from them
 about how you were found and the lengths they may have gone to to get you to a safe place.

 The items that were on your character must be retrieved, some can be lost and condition degraded all depending on settings.
 
 %c[200,200,50,50] Not compatible with Azazel mode.
 
 %c[200,200,50,50] Not compatible with Ironman.
